content.raw: @{5c0d82b3128c7106f57691a7} why are you switching back to “catkin installation”?! You should rather go the “docker” version, I mean “solution docker” or did I miss something? \(in reality one of the notes I made regarding “Virtual Track” to organizers \(after their deadline reminder\) was to remove “alternative solutions” \(like “catkin install”\) and focus only on the ONE, which is necessary for final deployment?? So I would propose to drop “catkin installation”, but maybe there is some needs of it??
content.html: @Sophisticated Engineering why are you switching back to “catkin installation”?! You should rather go the “docker” version, I mean “solution docker” or did I miss something? (in reality one of the notes I made regarding “Virtual Track” to organizers (after their deadline reminder) was to remove “alternative solutions” (like “catkin install”) and focus only on the ONE, which is necessary for final deployment?? So I would propose to drop “catkin installation”, but maybe there is some needs of it??
